199   @GET
200   @Path("")
201   @RestQuery(name = "getseries", description = "Returns a list of series.", returnDescription = "", restParameters = {
202           @RestParameter(name = "onlyWithWriteAccess", isRequired = false, description = "Whether only to get the series to which we have write access.", type = RestParameter.Type.BOOLEAN),
203           @RestParameter(name = "filter", isRequired = false, description = "Usage <Filter Name>:<Value to Filter With>. Filters can combine using a comma \",\". Available Filters: managedAcl, contributors, CreationDate, Creator, textFilter, language, license, organizers, subject, title. If API ver > 1.1.0 also: identifier, description, creator, publishers, rightsholder.", type = STRING),
204           @RestParameter(name = "sort", description = "Sort the results based upon a list of comma seperated sorting criteria. In the comma seperated list each type of sorting is specified as a pair such as: <Sort Name>:ASC or <Sort Name>:DESC. Adding the suffix ASC or DESC sets the order as ascending or descending order and is mandatory.", isRequired = false, type = STRING),
205           @RestParameter(name = "limit", description = "The maximum number of results to return for a single request.", isRequired = false, type = RestParameter.Type.INTEGER),
206           @RestParameter(name = "offset", description = "The index of the first result to return.", isRequired = false, type = RestParameter.Type.INTEGER),
207           @RestParameter(name = "withacl", isRequired = false, description = "Whether the acl should be included in the response.", type = RestParameter.Type.BOOLEAN)
208         }, responses = {
209           @RestResponse(description = "A (potentially empty) list of series is returned.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK) })
210   public Response getSeriesList(@HeaderParam("Accept") String acceptHeader, @QueryParam("filter") String filter,
211           @QueryParam("sort") String sort, @QueryParam("order") String order, @QueryParam("offset") int offset,
212           @QueryParam("limit") int limit, @QueryParam("onlyWithWriteAccess") Boolean onlyWithWriteAccess,
213           @QueryParam("withacl") Boolean withAcl) throws UnauthorizedException {
214     final ApiVersion requestedVersion = ApiMediaType.parse(acceptHeader).getVersion();
215     if (requestedVersion.isSmallerThan(VERSION_1_5_0)) {
216       // withAcl was added for version 1.5.0 and should be ignored for smaller versions.
217       withAcl = false;
218     }
219     try {
220       SeriesSearchQuery query = new SeriesSearchQuery(securityService.getOrganization().getId(),
221               securityService.getUser());
222       Option<String> optSort = Option.option(trimToNull(sort));
223 
224       if (offset > 0) {
225         query.withOffset(offset);
226       }
227 
228       // If limit is 0, we set the default limit
229       query.withLimit(limit < 1 ? DEFAULT_LIMIT : limit);
230 
231       // Parse the filters
232       if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(filter)) {
233         for (String f : filter.split(",")) {
234           String[] filterTuple = f.split(":",2);
235           if (filterTuple.length < 2) {
236             logger.debug("Filter {} not valid: {}", filterTuple[0], filter);
237             continue;
238           }
239           String name = filterTuple[0];
240 
241           String value;
242           if (!requestedVersion.isSmallerThan(VERSION_1_1_0)) {
243             // MH-13038 - 1.1.0 and higher support semi-colons in values
244             value = f.substring(name.length() + 1);
245           } else {
246             value = filterTuple[1];
247           }
248 
249           if ("managedAcl".equals(name)) {
250             query.withManagedAcl(value);
251           } else if ("contributors".equals(name)) {
252             query.withContributor(value);
253           } else if ("CreationDate".equals(name)) {
254               try {
255                 Tuple<Date, Date> fromAndToCreationRange = getFromAndToCreationRange(value.split("/")[0],
256                         value.split("/")[1]);
257                 query.withCreatedFrom(fromAndToCreationRange.getA());
258                 query.withCreatedTo(fromAndToCreationRange.getB());
259               } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
260                 return RestUtil.R.badRequest(e.getMessage());
261               } catch (ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException e) {
262                 String dateErrorMsg = String.format("Filter Series API error: Malformed date period. "
263                     + "Correct UTC time period format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ/yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ, "
264                     + "stated date period string: \"%s\"", value);
265                 logger.warn(dateErrorMsg);
266                 return RestUtil.R.badRequest(dateErrorMsg);
267               }
268           } else if ("Creator".equals(name)) {
269             query.withCreator(value);
270           } else if ("textFilter".equals(name)) {
271             query.withText(value);
272           } else if ("language".equals(name)) {
273             query.withLanguage(value);
274           } else if ("license".equals(name)) {
275             query.withLicense(value);
276           } else if ("organizers".equals(name)) {
277             query.withOrganizer(value);
278           } else if ("subject".equals(name)) {
279             query.withSubject(value);
280           } else if ("title".equals(name)) {
281             query.withTitle(value);
282           } else if (!requestedVersion.isSmallerThan(VERSION_1_1_0)) {
283             // additional filters only available with Version 1.1.0 or higher
284             if ("identifier".equals(name)) {
285               query.withIdentifier(value);
286             } else if ("description".equals(name)) {
287               query.withDescription(value);
288             } else if ("creator".equals(name)) {
289               query.withCreator(value);
290             } else if ("publishers".equals(name)) {
291               query.withPublisher(value);
292             } else if ("rightsholder".equals(name)) {
293               query.withRightsHolder(value);
294             } else {
295               logger.warn("Unknown filter criteria {}", name);
296               return Response.status(SC_BAD_REQUEST).build();
297             }
298           }
299         }
300       }
301 
302       if (optSort.isSome()) {
303         ArrayList<SortCriterion> sortCriteria = RestUtils.parseSortQueryParameter(optSort.get());
304         for (SortCriterion criterion : sortCriteria) {
305 
306           switch (criterion.getFieldName()) {
307             case SeriesIndexSchema.TITLE:
308               query.sortByTitle(criterion.getOrder());
309               break;
310             case SeriesIndexSchema.CONTRIBUTORS:
311               query.sortByContributors(criterion.getOrder());
312               break;
313             case SeriesIndexSchema.CREATOR:
314               query.sortByOrganizers(criterion.getOrder());
315               break;
316             case EventIndexSchema.CREATED:
317               query.sortByCreatedDateTime(criterion.getOrder());
318               break;
319             default:
320               logger.info("Unknown sort criteria {}", criterion.getFieldName());
321               return Response.status(SC_BAD_REQUEST).build();
322           }
323         }
324       }
325 
326       if (onlyWithWriteAccess != null && onlyWithWriteAccess) {
327         query.withoutActions();
328         query.withAction(Permissions.Action.WRITE);
329       }
330 
331       logger.trace("Using Query: " + query.toString());
332 
333       SearchResult<Series> result = elasticsearchIndex.getByQuery(query);
334       final boolean includeAcl = (withAcl != null && withAcl);
335       return queryResultToJson(result, includeAcl, requestedVersion);
336 
337     } catch (Exception e) {
338       logger.warn("Could not perform search query", e);
339       throw new WebApplicationException(Response.Status.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);
340     }
341   }
342 
343   private Response queryResultToJson(SearchResult<Series> result, boolean includeAcl, ApiVersion requestedVersion) {
344     JsonArray seriesArray = new JsonArray();
345 
346     for (SearchResultItem<Series> item : result.getItems()) {
347       final Series s = item.getSource();
348       JsonArray subjects;
349       if (s.getSubject() == null) {
350         subjects = new JsonArray();
351       } else {
352         subjects = splitSubjectIntoArray(s.getSubject());
353       }
354 
355       Date createdDate = s.getCreatedDateTime();
356       JsonObject seriesJson = new JsonObject();
357 
358       seriesJson.addProperty("identifier", s.getIdentifier());
359       seriesJson.addProperty("title", s.getTitle());
360       seriesJson.addProperty("creator", safeString(s.getCreator()));
361       seriesJson.addProperty("created", createdDate != null ? toUTC(createdDate.getTime()) : "");
362       seriesJson.add("subjects", subjects);
363 
364       seriesJson.add("contributors", collectionToJsonArray(s.getContributors()));
365       seriesJson.add("organizers", collectionToJsonArray(s.getOrganizers()));
366       seriesJson.add("publishers", collectionToJsonArray(s.getPublishers()));
367 
368       if (!requestedVersion.isSmallerThan(VERSION_1_1_0)) {
369         seriesJson.addProperty("description", safeString(s.getDescription()));
370         seriesJson.addProperty("language", safeString(s.getLanguage()));
371         seriesJson.addProperty("license", safeString(s.getLicense()));
372         seriesJson.addProperty("rightsholder", safeString(s.getRightsHolder()));
373 
374         if (includeAcl) {
375           AccessControlList acl = getAclFromSeries(s);
376           seriesJson.add("acl", AclUtils.serializeAclToJson(acl));
377         }
378       }
379 
380       seriesArray.add(seriesJson);
381     }
382 
383     return ApiResponseBuilder.Json.ok(requestedVersion, seriesArray);
384   }
385 
386   /**
387    * Get an {@link AccessControlList} from a {@link Series}.
388    *
389    * @param series
390    *          The {@link Series} to get the ACL from.
391    * @return The {@link AccessControlList} stored in the {@link Series}
392    */
393   private static AccessControlList getAclFromSeries(Series series) {
394     AccessControlList activeAcl = new AccessControlList();
395     try {
396       if (series.getAccessPolicy() != null) {
397         activeAcl = AccessControlParser.parseAcl(series.getAccessPolicy());
398       }
399     } catch (Exception e) {
400       logger.error("Unable to parse access policy", e);
401     }
402     return activeAcl;
403   }

405   @GET
406   @Path("{seriesId}")
407   @RestQuery(name = "getseries", description = "Returns a single series.", returnDescription = "",
408   pathParameters = {
409           @RestParameter(name = "seriesId", description = "The series id", isRequired = true, type = STRING)
410   }, restParameters = {
411           @RestParameter(name = "withacl", isRequired = false, type = RestParameter.Type.BOOLEAN,
412                          description = "Whether the acl should be included in the response.")
413   }, responses = {
414           @RestResponse(description = "The series is returned.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK),
415           @RestResponse(description = "The specified series does not exist.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_NOT_FOUND),
416   })
417   public Response getSeries(@HeaderParam("Accept") String acceptHeader, @PathParam("seriesId") String id,
418                             @QueryParam("withacl") Boolean withAcl)
419           throws Exception {
420     final ApiVersion requestedVersion = ApiMediaType.parse(acceptHeader).getVersion();
421     if (requestedVersion.isSmallerThan(VERSION_1_5_0)) {
422       // withAcl was added for version 1.5.0 and should be ignored for smaller versions.
423       withAcl = false;
424     }
425 
426     Optional<Series> optSeries = elasticsearchIndex.getSeries(id, securityService.getOrganization().getId(), securityService.getUser());
427     if (optSeries.isPresent()) {
428       final Series s = optSeries.get();
429       JsonArray subjects;
430       if (s.getSubject() == null) {
431         subjects = new JsonArray();
432       } else {
433         subjects = splitSubjectIntoArray(s.getSubject());
434       }
435       Date createdDate = s.getCreatedDateTime();
436 
437       JsonObject responseContent = new JsonObject();
438 
439       // Common fields
440       responseContent.addProperty("identifier", s.getIdentifier());
441       responseContent.addProperty("title", s.getTitle());
442       responseContent.addProperty("description", safeString(s.getDescription()));
443       responseContent.addProperty("creator", safeString(s.getCreator()));
444       responseContent.add("subjects", subjects);
445       responseContent.addProperty("organization", s.getOrganization());
446       responseContent.addProperty("created", createdDate != null ? toUTC(createdDate.getTime()) : "");
447       responseContent.add("contributors", collectionToJsonArray(s.getContributors()));
448       responseContent.add("organizers", collectionToJsonArray(s.getOrganizers()));
449       responseContent.addProperty("opt_out", false);
450       responseContent.add("publishers", collectionToJsonArray(s.getPublishers()));
451 
452       if (!requestedVersion.isSmallerThan(VERSION_1_1_0)) {
453         responseContent.addProperty("language", safeString(s.getLanguage()));
454         responseContent.addProperty("license", safeString(s.getLicense()));
455         responseContent.addProperty("rightsholder", safeString(s.getRightsHolder()));
456 
457         if (withAcl != null && withAcl) {
458           AccessControlList acl = getAclFromSeries(s);
459           JsonArray aclJsonArray = AclUtils.serializeAclToJson(acl);
460           responseContent.add("acl", aclJsonArray);
461         }
462       }
463 
464       return ApiResponseBuilder.Json.ok(requestedVersion, responseContent);
465     }
466     return ApiResponseBuilder.notFound("Cannot find an series with id '%s'.", id);
467   }
468 
469   private JsonArray splitSubjectIntoArray(final String subject) {
470     JsonArray array = new JsonArray();
471     if (subject != null && !subject.trim().isEmpty()) {
472       for (String part : subject.split(",")) {
473         array.add(new JsonPrimitive(part.trim()));
474       }
475     }
476     return array;
477   }

479   @GET
480   @Path("{seriesId}/metadata")
481   @RestQuery(name = "getseriesmetadata", description = "Returns a series' metadata of all types or returns a series' metadata collection of the given type when the query string parameter type is specified. For each metadata catalog there is a unique property called the flavor such as dublincore/series so the type in this example would be 'dublincore/series'", returnDescription = "", pathParameters = {
482           @RestParameter(name = "seriesId", description = "The series id", isRequired = true, type = STRING) }, restParameters = {
483                   @RestParameter(name = "type", isRequired = false, description = "The type of metadata to return", type = STRING) }, responses = {
484                           @RestResponse(description = "The series' metadata are returned.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK),
485                           @RestResponse(description = "The specified series does not exist.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_NOT_FOUND) })
486   public Response getSeriesMetadata(@HeaderParam("Accept") String acceptHeader, @PathParam("seriesId") String id,
487           @QueryParam("type") String type) throws Exception {
488     final ApiVersion requestedVersion = ApiMediaType.parse(acceptHeader).getVersion();
489     if (StringUtils.trimToNull(type) == null) {
490       return getAllMetadata(id, requestedVersion);
491     } else {
492       return getMetadataByType(id, type, requestedVersion);
493     }
494   }
495 
496   private Response getAllMetadata(String id, ApiVersion requestedVersion) throws SearchIndexException {
497     Optional<Series> optSeries = elasticsearchIndex.getSeries(id, securityService.getOrganization().getId(), securityService.getUser());
498     if (optSeries.isEmpty())
499       return ApiResponseBuilder.notFound("Cannot find a series with id '%s'.", id);
500 
501     MetadataList metadataList = new MetadataList();
502     List<SeriesCatalogUIAdapter> catalogUIAdapters = indexService.getSeriesCatalogUIAdapters();
503     catalogUIAdapters.remove(indexService.getCommonSeriesCatalogUIAdapter());
504     for (SeriesCatalogUIAdapter adapter : catalogUIAdapters) {
505       final Optional<DublinCoreMetadataCollection> optSeriesMetadata = adapter.getFields(id);
506       if (optSeriesMetadata.isPresent()) {
507         metadataList.add(adapter.getFlavor().toString(), adapter.getUITitle(), optSeriesMetadata.get());
508       }
509     }
510     DublinCoreMetadataCollection collection = getSeriesMetadata(optSeries.get());
511     ExternalMetadataUtils.changeSubjectToSubjects(collection);
512     metadataList.add(indexService.getCommonSeriesCatalogUIAdapter(), collection);
513     return ApiResponseBuilder.Json.ok(requestedVersion, MetadataJson.listToJson(metadataList, false));
514   }
515 
516   private Response getMetadataByType(String id, String type, ApiVersion requestedVersion) throws SearchIndexException {
517     Optional<Series> optSeries = elasticsearchIndex.getSeries(id, securityService.getOrganization().getId(), securityService.getUser());
518     if (optSeries.isEmpty())
519       return ApiResponseBuilder.notFound("Cannot find a series with id '%s'.", id);
520 
521     // Try the main catalog first as we load it from the index.
522     if (typeMatchesSeriesCatalogUIAdapter(type, indexService.getCommonSeriesCatalogUIAdapter())) {
523       DublinCoreMetadataCollection collection = getSeriesMetadata(optSeries.get());
524       ExternalMetadataUtils.changeSubjectToSubjects(collection);
525       return ApiResponseBuilder.Json.ok(requestedVersion, MetadataJson.collectionToJson(collection, false));
526     }
527 
528     // Try the other catalogs
529     List<SeriesCatalogUIAdapter> catalogUIAdapters = indexService.getSeriesCatalogUIAdapters();
530     catalogUIAdapters.remove(indexService.getCommonSeriesCatalogUIAdapter());
531 
532     for (SeriesCatalogUIAdapter adapter : catalogUIAdapters) {
533       if (typeMatchesSeriesCatalogUIAdapter(type, adapter)) {
534         final Optional<DublinCoreMetadataCollection> optSeriesMetadata = adapter.getFields(id);
535         if (optSeriesMetadata.isPresent()) {
536           return ApiResponseBuilder.Json.ok(requestedVersion, MetadataJson.collectionToJson(optSeriesMetadata.get(), true));
537         }
538       }
539     }
540     return ApiResponseBuilder.notFound("Cannot find a catalog with type '%s' for series with id '%s'.", type, id);
541   }

543   /**
544    * Loads the metadata for the given series
545    *
546    * @param series
547    *          the source {@link Series}
548    * @return a {@link DublinCoreMetadataCollection} instance with all the series metadata
549    */
550   private DublinCoreMetadataCollection getSeriesMetadata(Series series) {
551     DublinCoreMetadataCollection metadata = indexService.getCommonSeriesCatalogUIAdapter().getRawFields();
552 
553     MetadataField title = metadata.getOutputFields().get(DublinCore.PROPERTY_TITLE.getLocalName());
554     metadata.removeField(title);
555     MetadataField newTitle = new MetadataField(title);
556     newTitle.setValue(series.getTitle());
557     metadata.addField(newTitle);
558 
559     MetadataField subject = metadata.getOutputFields().get(DublinCore.PROPERTY_SUBJECT.getLocalName());
560     metadata.removeField(subject);
561     MetadataField newSubject = new MetadataField(subject);
562     newSubject.setValue(series.getSubject());
563     metadata.addField(newSubject);
564 
565     MetadataField description = metadata.getOutputFields().get(DublinCore.PROPERTY_DESCRIPTION.getLocalName());
566     metadata.removeField(description);
567     MetadataField newDescription = new MetadataField(description);
568     newDescription.setValue(series.getDescription());
569     metadata.addField(newDescription);
570 
571     MetadataField language = metadata.getOutputFields().get(DublinCore.PROPERTY_LANGUAGE.getLocalName());
572     metadata.removeField(language);
573     MetadataField newLanguage = new MetadataField(language);
574     newLanguage.setValue(series.getLanguage());
575     metadata.addField(newLanguage);
576 
577     MetadataField rightsHolder = metadata.getOutputFields().get(DublinCore.PROPERTY_RIGHTS_HOLDER.getLocalName());
578     metadata.removeField(rightsHolder);
579     MetadataField newRightsHolder = new MetadataField(rightsHolder);
580     newRightsHolder.setValue(series.getRightsHolder());
581     metadata.addField(newRightsHolder);
582 
583     MetadataField license = metadata.getOutputFields().get(DublinCore.PROPERTY_LICENSE.getLocalName());
584     metadata.removeField(license);
585     MetadataField newLicense = new MetadataField(license);
586     newLicense.setValue(series.getLicense());
587     metadata.addField(newLicense);
588 
589     MetadataField organizers = metadata.getOutputFields().get(DublinCore.PROPERTY_CREATOR.getLocalName());
590     metadata.removeField(organizers);
591     MetadataField newOrganizers = new MetadataField(organizers);
592     newOrganizers.setValue(StringUtils.join(series.getOrganizers(), ", "));
593     metadata.addField(newOrganizers);
594 
595     MetadataField contributors = metadata.getOutputFields().get(DublinCore.PROPERTY_CONTRIBUTOR.getLocalName());
596     metadata.removeField(contributors);
597     MetadataField newContributors = new MetadataField(contributors);
598     newContributors.setValue(StringUtils.join(series.getContributors(), ", "));
599     metadata.addField(newContributors);
600 
601     MetadataField publishers = metadata.getOutputFields().get(DublinCore.PROPERTY_PUBLISHER.getLocalName());
602     metadata.removeField(publishers);
603     MetadataField newPublishers = new MetadataField(publishers);
604     newPublishers.setValue(StringUtils.join(series.getPublishers(), ", "));
605     metadata.addField(newPublishers);
606 
607     // Admin UI only field
608     MetadataField createdBy = new MetadataField(
609             "createdBy",
610             null,
611             "EVENTS.SERIES.DETAILS.METADATA.CREATED_BY",
612             true,
613             false,
614             null,
615             null,
616             MetadataField.Type.TEXT,
617             null,
618             null,
619             CREATED_BY_UI_ORDER,
620             null,
621             null,
622             null,
623             null);
624     createdBy.setValue(series.getCreator());
625     metadata.addField(createdBy);
626 
627     MetadataField uid = metadata.getOutputFields().get(DublinCore.PROPERTY_IDENTIFIER.getLocalName());
628     metadata.removeField(uid);
629     MetadataField newUID = new MetadataField(uid);
630     newUID.setValue(series.getIdentifier());
631     metadata.addField(newUID);
632 
633     ExternalMetadataUtils.removeCollectionList(metadata);
634 
635     return metadata;
636   }

638   /**
639    * Checks if a flavor type matches a series catalog's flavor type.
640    *
641    * @param type
642    *          The flavor type to compare against the catalog's flavor
643    * @param catalog
644    *          The catalog to check if it matches the flavor.
645    * @return True if it matches.
646    */
647   private boolean typeMatchesSeriesCatalogUIAdapter(String type, SeriesCatalogUIAdapter catalog) {
648     if (StringUtils.trimToNull(type) == null) {
649       return false;
650     }
651     MediaPackageElementFlavor catalogFlavor = MediaPackageElementFlavor.parseFlavor(catalog.getFlavor().toString());
652     try {
653       MediaPackageElementFlavor flavor = MediaPackageElementFlavor.parseFlavor(type);
654       return flavor.equals(catalogFlavor);
655     } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
656       return false;
657     }
658   }
659 
660   private Optional<MediaPackageElementFlavor> getFlavor(String flavorString) {
661     try {
662       MediaPackageElementFlavor flavor = MediaPackageElementFlavor.parseFlavor(flavorString);
663       return Optional.of(flavor);
664     } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
665       return Optional.empty();
666     }
667   }

669   @PUT
670   @Path("{seriesId}/metadata")
671   @RestQuery(name = "updateseriesmetadata", description = "Update a series' metadata of the given type. For a metadata catalog there is the flavor such as 'dublincore/series' and this is the unique type.", returnDescription = "", pathParameters = {
672           @RestParameter(name = "seriesId", description = "The series id", isRequired = true, type = STRING) }, restParameters = {
673                   @RestParameter(name = "type", isRequired = true, description = "The type of metadata to update", type = STRING),
674                   @RestParameter(name = "metadata", description = "Series metadata as Form param", isRequired = true, type = STRING) }, responses = {
675                           @RestResponse(description = "The series' metadata have been updated.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK),
676                           @RestResponse(description = "The request is invalid or inconsistent.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_BAD_REQUEST),
677                           @RestResponse(description = "The specified series does not exist.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_NOT_FOUND) })
678   public Response updateSeriesMetadata(@HeaderParam("Accept") String acceptHeader, @PathParam("seriesId") String id,
679           @QueryParam("type") String type, @FormParam("metadata") String metadataJSON) throws Exception {
680     if (StringUtils.trimToNull(metadataJSON) == null) {
681       return RestUtil.R.badRequest("Unable to update metadata for series as the metadata provided is empty.");
682     }
683     Map<String, String> updatedFields;
684     try {
685       updatedFields = RequestUtils.getKeyValueMap(metadataJSON);
686     } catch (ParseException e) {
687       logger.debug("Unable to update series '{}' with metadata type '{}' and content '{}'", id, type, metadataJSON, e);
688       return RestUtil.R.badRequest(String.format("Unable to parse metadata fields as json from '%s' because '%s'",
689               metadataJSON, e.getMessage()));
690     } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
691       return RestUtil.R.badRequest(e.getMessage());
692     }
693 
694     if (updatedFields == null || updatedFields.size() == 0) {
695       return RestUtil.R.badRequest(
696               String.format("Unable to parse metadata fields as json from '%s' because there were no fields to update.",
697                       metadataJSON));
698     }
699 
700     Optional<DublinCoreMetadataCollection> optCollection = Optional.empty();
701     SeriesCatalogUIAdapter adapter = null;
702 
703     Optional<Series> optSeries = elasticsearchIndex.getSeries(id, securityService.getOrganization().getId(), securityService.getUser());
704     if (optSeries.isEmpty())
705       return ApiResponseBuilder.notFound("Cannot find a series with id '%s'.", id);
706 
707     MetadataList metadataList = new MetadataList();
708 
709     // Try the main catalog first as we load it from the index.
710     if (typeMatchesSeriesCatalogUIAdapter(type, indexService.getCommonSeriesCatalogUIAdapter())) {
711       optCollection = Optional.of(getSeriesMetadata(optSeries.get()));
712       adapter = indexService.getCommonSeriesCatalogUIAdapter();
713     } else {
714       metadataList.add(indexService.getCommonSeriesCatalogUIAdapter(), getSeriesMetadata(optSeries.get()));
715     }
716 
717     // Try the other catalogs
718     List<SeriesCatalogUIAdapter> catalogUIAdapters = indexService.getSeriesCatalogUIAdapters();
719     catalogUIAdapters.remove(indexService.getCommonSeriesCatalogUIAdapter());
720     if (catalogUIAdapters.size() > 0) {
721       for (SeriesCatalogUIAdapter catalogUIAdapter : catalogUIAdapters) {
722         if (typeMatchesSeriesCatalogUIAdapter(type, catalogUIAdapter)) {
723           optCollection = catalogUIAdapter.getFields(id);
724           adapter = catalogUIAdapter;
725         } else {
726           Optional<DublinCoreMetadataCollection> current = catalogUIAdapter.getFields(id);
727           if (current.isPresent()) {
728             metadataList.add(catalogUIAdapter, current.get());
729           }
730         }
731       }
732     }
733 
734     if (optCollection.isEmpty()) {
735       return ApiResponseBuilder.notFound("Cannot find a catalog with type '%s' for series with id '%s'.", type, id);
736     }
737 
738     DublinCoreMetadataCollection collection = optCollection.get();
739 
740     for (String key : updatedFields.keySet()) {
741       MetadataField field = collection.getOutputFields().get(key);
742       if (field == null) {
743         return ApiResponseBuilder.notFound(
744                 "Cannot find a metadata field with id '%s' from event with id '%s' and the metadata type '%s'.", key,
745                 id, type);
746       } else if (field.isRequired() && StringUtils.isBlank(updatedFields.get(key))) {
747         return R.badRequest(String.format(
748                 "The series metadata field with id '%s' and the metadata type '%s' is required and can not be empty!.",
749                 key, type));
750       }
751       collection.removeField(field);
752       collection.addField(MetadataJson.copyWithDifferentJsonValue(field, updatedFields.get(key)));
753     }
754 
755     metadataList.add(adapter, collection);
756     indexService.updateAllSeriesMetadata(id, metadataList, elasticsearchIndex);
757     return ApiResponseBuilder.Json.ok(acceptHeader, "");
758   }

760   @DELETE
761   @Path("{seriesId}/metadata")
762   @RestQuery(name = "deleteseriesmetadata", description = "Deletes a series' metadata catalog of the given type. All fields and values of that catalog will be deleted.", returnDescription = "", pathParameters = {
763           @RestParameter(name = "seriesId", description = "The series id", isRequired = true, type = STRING) }, restParameters = {
764                   @RestParameter(name = "type", isRequired = true, description = "The type of metadata to delete", type = STRING) }, responses = {
765                           @RestResponse(description = "The metadata have been deleted.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_NO_CONTENT),
766                           @RestResponse(description = "The main metadata catalog dublincore/series cannot be deleted as it has mandatory fields.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_FORBIDDEN),
767                           @RestResponse(description = "The specified series does not exist.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_NOT_FOUND) })
768   public Response deleteSeriesMetadataByType(@HeaderParam("Accept") String acceptHeader,
769           @PathParam("seriesId") String id, @QueryParam("type") String type) throws Exception {
770     if (StringUtils.trimToNull(type) == null) {
771       return RestUtil.R
772               .badRequest(String.format("A type of catalog needs to be specified for series '%s' to delete it.", id));
773     }
774 
775     Optional<MediaPackageElementFlavor> flavor = getFlavor(type);
776 
777     if (flavor.isEmpty()) {
778       return RestUtil.R.badRequest(
779               String.format("Unable to parse flavor '%s' it should look something like dublincore/series.", type));
780     }
781 
782     if (typeMatchesSeriesCatalogUIAdapter(type, indexService.getCommonSeriesCatalogUIAdapter())) {
783       return Response
784               .status(Status.FORBIDDEN).entity(String
785                       .format("Unable to delete mandatory metadata catalog with type '%s' for series '%s'", type, id))
786               .build();
787     }
788 
789     Optional<Series> optSeries = elasticsearchIndex.getSeries(id, securityService.getOrganization().getId(), securityService.getUser());
790     if (optSeries.isEmpty())
791       return ApiResponseBuilder.notFound("Cannot find a series with id '%s'.", id);
792 
793     try {
794       indexService.removeCatalogByFlavor(optSeries.get(), MediaPackageElementFlavor.parseFlavor(type));
795     } catch (NotFoundException e) {
796       return ApiResponseBuilder.notFound(e.getMessage());
797     }
798     return Response.noContent().build();
799   }

801   @GET
802   @Path("{seriesId}/acl")
803   @RestQuery(name = "getseriesacl", description = "Returns a series' access policy.", returnDescription = "", pathParameters = {
804           @RestParameter(name = "seriesId", description = "The series id", isRequired = true, type = STRING) }, responses = {
805                   @RestResponse(description = "The series' access policy is returned.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK),
806                   @RestResponse(description = "The specified series does not exist.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_NOT_FOUND) })
807   public Response getSeriesAcl(@HeaderParam("Accept") String acceptHeader, @PathParam("seriesId") String id) throws Exception {
808     final ApiVersion requestedVersion = ApiMediaType.parse(acceptHeader).getVersion();
809     JSONParser parser = new JSONParser();
810     Optional<Series> optSeries = elasticsearchIndex.getSeries(id, securityService.getOrganization().getId(), securityService.getUser());
811     if (optSeries.isPresent()) {
812       Series series = optSeries.get();
813       // The ACL is stored as JSON string in the index. Parse it and extract the part we want to have in the API.
814       if (series.getAccessPolicy() == null) {
815         return ApiResponseBuilder.notFound("Acl for series with id '%s' is not defined.", id);
816       }
817       JSONObject acl = (JSONObject) parser.parse(series.getAccessPolicy());
818 
819       if (!((JSONObject) acl.get("acl")).containsKey("ace")) {
820         return ApiResponseBuilder.notFound("Cannot find acl for series with id '%s'.", id);
821       } else {
822         return ApiResponseBuilder.Json.ok(requestedVersion, ((JSONArray) ((JSONObject) acl.get("acl")).get("ace")).toJSONString());
823       }
824     }
825 
826     return ApiResponseBuilder.notFound("Cannot find an series with id '%s'.", id);
827   }

892   @POST
893   @Path("")
894   @RestQuery(name = "createseries", description = "Creates a series.", returnDescription = "", restParameters = {
895           @RestParameter(name = "metadata", isRequired = true, description = "Series metadata", type = STRING),
896           @RestParameter(name = "acl", description = "A collection of roles with their possible action", isRequired = true, type = STRING),
897           @RestParameter(name = "theme", description = "The theme ID to be applied to the series", isRequired = false, type = STRING) }, responses = {
898                   @RestResponse(description = "A new series is created and its identifier is returned in the Location header.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_CREATED),
899                   @RestResponse(description = "The request is invalid or inconsistent..", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_BAD_REQUEST),
900                   @RestResponse(description = "The user doesn't have the rights to create the series.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_UNAUTHORIZED) })
901   public Response createNewSeries(@HeaderParam("Accept") String acceptHeader,
902           @FormParam("metadata") String metadataParam, @FormParam("acl") String aclParam,
903           @FormParam("theme") String themeIdParam) throws UnauthorizedException, NotFoundException {
904     if (isBlank(metadataParam))
905       return R.badRequest("Required parameter 'metadata' is missing or invalid");
906 
907     if (isBlank(aclParam))
908       return R.badRequest("Required parameter 'acl' is missing or invalid");
909 
910     MetadataList metadataList;
911     try {
912       metadataList = deserializeMetadataList(metadataParam);
913     } catch (ParseException e) {
914       logger.debug("Unable to parse series metadata '{}'", metadataParam, e);
915       return R.badRequest(String.format("Unable to parse metadata because '%s'", e.getMessage()));
916     } catch (NotFoundException e) {
917       // One of the metadata fields could not be found in the catalogs or one of the catalogs cannot be found.
918       return R.badRequest(e.getMessage());
919     } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
920       logger.debug("Unable to create series with metadata '{}'", metadataParam, e);
921       return R.badRequest(e.getMessage());
922     }
923     Map<String, String> options = new TreeMap<>();
924     Optional<Long> optThemeId = Optional.empty();
925     if (StringUtils.trimToNull(themeIdParam) != null) {
926       try {
927         Long themeId = Long.parseLong(themeIdParam);
928         optThemeId = Optional.of(themeId);
929       } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
930         return R.badRequest(String.format("Unable to parse the theme id '%s' into a number", themeIdParam));
931       }
932     }
933     AccessControlList acl;
934     try {
935       acl = AclUtils.deserializeJsonToAcl(aclParam, false);
936     } catch (ParseException e) {
937       logger.debug("Unable to parse acl '{}'", aclParam, e);
938       return R.badRequest(String.format("Unable to parse acl '%s' because '%s'", aclParam, e.getMessage()));
939     } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
940       logger.debug("Unable to create new series with acl '{}'", aclParam, e);
941       return R.badRequest(e.getMessage());
942     }
943 
944     try {
945       String seriesId = indexService.createSeries(metadataList, options, Optional.of(acl), optThemeId);
946       JsonObject json = new JsonObject();
947       json.addProperty("identifier", safeString(seriesId));
948       return ApiResponseBuilder.Json.created(acceptHeader, URI.create(getSeriesUrl(seriesId)), json);
949     } catch (IndexServiceException e) {
950       logger.error("Unable to create series with metadata '{}', acl '{}', theme '{}'",
951               metadataParam, aclParam, themeIdParam, e);
952       throw new WebApplicationException(e, Status.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);
953     }
954   }

956   /**
957    * Change the simplified fields of key values provided to the external api into a {@link MetadataList}.
958    *
959    * @param json
960    *          The json string that contains an array of metadata field lists for the different catalogs.
961    * @return A {@link MetadataList} with the fields populated with the values provided.
962    * @throws ParseException
963    *           Thrown if unable to parse the json string.
964    * @throws NotFoundException
965    *           Thrown if unable to find the catalog or field that the json refers to.
966    */
967   protected MetadataList deserializeMetadataList(String json) throws ParseException, NotFoundException {
968     MetadataList metadataList = new MetadataList();
969     JSONParser parser = new JSONParser();
970     JSONArray jsonCatalogs = (JSONArray) parser.parse(json);
971     for (int i = 0; i < jsonCatalogs.size(); i++) {
972       JSONObject catalog = (JSONObject) jsonCatalogs.get(i);
973       if (catalog.get("flavor") == null || StringUtils.isBlank(catalog.get("flavor").toString())) {
974         throw new IllegalArgumentException(
975                 "Unable to create new series as no flavor was given for one of the metadata collections");
976       }
977       String flavorString = catalog.get("flavor").toString();
978 
979       MediaPackageElementFlavor flavor = MediaPackageElementFlavor.parseFlavor(flavorString);
980 
981       DublinCoreMetadataCollection collection = null;
982       SeriesCatalogUIAdapter adapter = null;
983       for (SeriesCatalogUIAdapter seriesCatalogUIAdapter : indexService.getSeriesCatalogUIAdapters()) {
984         MediaPackageElementFlavor catalogFlavor = MediaPackageElementFlavor
985                 .parseFlavor(seriesCatalogUIAdapter.getFlavor().toString());
986         if (catalogFlavor.equals(flavor)) {
987           adapter = seriesCatalogUIAdapter;
988           collection = seriesCatalogUIAdapter.getRawFields();
989         }
990       }
991 
992       if (collection == null) {
993         throw new IllegalArgumentException(
994                 String.format("Unable to find an SeriesCatalogUIAdapter with Flavor '%s'", flavorString));
995       }
996 
997       String fieldsJson = catalog.get("fields").toString();
998       if (StringUtils.trimToNull(fieldsJson) != null) {
999         Map<String, String> fields = RequestUtils.getKeyValueMap(fieldsJson);
1000         for (String key : fields.keySet()) {
1001           if ("subjects".equals(key)) {
1002             MetadataField field = collection.getOutputFields().get("subject");
1003             if (field == null) {
1004               throw new NotFoundException(String.format(
1005                       "Cannot find a metadata field with id '%s' from Catalog with Flavor '%s'.", key, flavorString));
1006             }
1007             collection.removeField(field);
1008             try {
1009               JSONArray subjects = (JSONArray) parser.parse(fields.get(key));
1010               collection.addField(
1011                       MetadataJson.copyWithDifferentJsonValue(field, StringUtils.join(subjects.iterator(), ",")));
1012             } catch (ParseException e) {
1013               throw new IllegalArgumentException(
1014                       String.format("Unable to parse the 'subjects' metadata array field because: %s", e.toString()));
1015             }
1016           } else {
1017             MetadataField field = collection.getOutputFields().get(key);
1018             if (field == null) {
1019               throw new NotFoundException(String.format(
1020                       "Cannot find a metadata field with id '%s' from Catalog with Flavor '%s'.", key, flavorString));
1021             }
1022             collection.removeField(field);
1023             collection.addField(MetadataJson.copyWithDifferentJsonValue(field, fields.get(key)));
1024           }
1025         }
1026       }
1027       metadataList.add(adapter, collection);
1028     }
1029     return metadataList;
1030   }

1032   @PUT
1033   @Path("{seriesId}/acl")
1034   @RestQuery(name = "updateseriesacl", description = "Updates a series' access policy.", returnDescription = "", pathParameters = {
1035           @RestParameter(name = "seriesId", description = "The series id", isRequired = true, type = STRING) }, restParameters = {

1038                           @RestResponse(description = "The access control list for the specified series is updated.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK),
1039                           @RestResponse(description = "The specified series does not exist.", responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_NOT_FOUND) })
1040   public Response updateSeriesAcl(@HeaderParam("Accept") String acceptHeader, @PathParam("seriesId") String seriesID,
1041           @FormParam("acl") String aclJson, @DefaultValue("false") @FormParam("override") boolean override)
1042           throws NotFoundException, SeriesException, UnauthorizedException {
1043     if (isBlank(aclJson))
1044       return R.badRequest("Missing form parameter 'acl'");
1045 
1046     final ApiVersion requestedVersion = ApiMediaType.parse(acceptHeader).getVersion();
1047     if (requestedVersion.isSmallerThan(VERSION_1_2_0)) {
1048       // override was added in version 1.2.0 and should be ignored for smaller versions
1049       override = false;
1050     }
1051 
1052     JSONParser parser = new JSONParser();
1053     JSONArray acl;
1054     try {
1055       acl = (JSONArray) parser.parse(aclJson);
1056     } catch (ParseException e) {
1057       logger.debug("Could not parse ACL ({})", aclJson, e);
1058       return R.badRequest("Could not parse ACL");
1059     }
1060 
1061     List<AccessControlEntry> accessControlEntries = ((List<?>) acl).stream()
1062       .map(a -> {
1063         JSONObject ace = (JSONObject) a;
1064         return new AccessControlEntry(
1065             (String) ace.get("role"),
1066             (String) ace.get("action"),
1067             (Boolean) ace.get("allow")
1068         );
1069       })
1070       .collect(Collectors.toList());
1071 
1072     seriesService.updateAccessControl(seriesID, new AccessControlList(accessControlEntries), override);
1073     return ApiResponseBuilder.Json.ok(acceptHeader, aclJson);
1074   }

1274   private SearchResult<Series> getSeries(
1275           String text,
1276           String seriesId,
1277           Boolean edit,
1278           String seriesTitle,
1279           String creator,
1280           String contributor,
1281           String publisher,
1282           String rightsHolder,
1283           String createdFrom,
1284           String createdTo,
1285           String language,
1286           String license,
1287           String subject,
1288           String description,
1289           String sort,
1290           String offsetString,
1291           String countString,
1292           Boolean fuzzyMatch
1293   ) throws SeriesException, UnauthorizedException {
1294     int offset = 0;
1295     if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(offsetString)) {
1296       try {
1297         offset = Integer.parseInt(offsetString);
1298       } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
1299         logger.warn("Bad start page parameter");
1300       }
1301       if (offset < 0) {
1302         offset = 0;
1303       }
1304     }
1305 
1306     int count = DEFAULT_LIMIT;
1307     if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(countString)) {
1308       try {
1309         count = Integer.parseInt(countString);
1310       } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
1311         logger.warn("Bad count parameter");
1312       }
1313       if (count < 1) {
1314         count = DEFAULT_LIMIT;
1315       }
1316     }
1317 
1318     SeriesSearchQuery q = new SeriesSearchQuery(securityService.getOrganization().getId(), securityService.getUser());
1319     q.withLimit(count);
1320     q.withOffset(offset);
1321     if (edit != null) {
1322       q.withEdit(edit);
1323     }
1324     if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(text)) {
1325       q.withText(fuzzyMatch.booleanValue(), text);
1326     }
1327     if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(seriesId)) {
1328       q.withIdentifier(seriesId);
1329     }
1330     if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(seriesTitle)) {
1331       q.withTitle(seriesTitle);
1332     }
1333     if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(creator)) {
1334       q.withCreator(creator);
1335     }
1336     if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(contributor)) {
1337       q.withContributor(contributor);
1338     }
1339     if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(language)) {
1340       q.withLanguage(language);
1341     }
1342     if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(license)) {
1343       q.withLicense(license);
1344     }
1345     if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(subject)) {
1346       q.withSubject(subject);
1347     }
1348     if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(publisher)) {
1349       q.withPublisher(publisher);
1350     }
1351     if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(description)) {
1352       q.withDescription(description);
1353     }
1354     if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(rightsHolder)) {
1355       q.withRightsHolder(rightsHolder);
1356     }
1357     try {
1358       if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(createdFrom)) {
1359         SimpleDateFormat formatter = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'", Locale.ENGLISH);
1360         Date date = formatter.parse(createdFrom);
1361         q.withCreatedFrom(date);
1362       }
1363       if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(createdTo)) {
1364         SimpleDateFormat formatter = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'", Locale.ENGLISH);
1365         Date date = formatter.parse(createdTo);
1366         q.withCreatedFrom(date);
1367       }
1368     } catch (java.text.ParseException e1) {
1369       logger.warn("Could not parse date parameter", e1);
1370     }
1371 
1372     if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(sort)) {
1373       String enumKey;
1374       SortCriterion.Order order;
1375       if (sort.endsWith("_DESC")) {
1376         enumKey = sort.substring(0, sort.length() - "_DESC".length()).toUpperCase();
1377         order = SortCriterion.Order.Descending;
1378       } else {
1379         enumKey = sort;
1380         order = SortCriterion.Order.Ascending;
1381       }
1382 
1383       try {
1384         switch (enumKey) {
1385           case SeriesIndexSchema.TITLE:
1386             q.sortByTitle(order);
1387             break;
1388           case SeriesIndexSchema.SUBJECT:
1389             q.sortBySubject(order);
1390             break;
1391           case SeriesIndexSchema.CREATOR:
1392             q.sortByCreator(order);
1393             break;
1394           case SeriesIndexSchema.PUBLISHERS:
1395             q.sortByPublishers(order);
1396             break;
1397           case SeriesIndexSchema.CONTRIBUTORS:
1398             q.sortByContributors(order);
1399             break;
1400           case SeriesIndexSchema.DESCRIPTION:
1401             q.sortByDescription(order);
1402             break;
1403           case SeriesIndexSchema.LANGUAGE:
1404             q.sortByLanguage(order);
1405             break;
1406           case SeriesIndexSchema.RIGHTS_HOLDER:
1407             q.sortByRightsHolder(order);
1408             break;
1409           case SeriesIndexSchema.LICENSE:
1410             q.sortByLicense(order);
1411             break;
1412           case SeriesIndexSchema.CREATED_DATE_TIME:
1413             q.sortByCreatedDateTime(order);
1414             break;
1415           case SeriesIndexSchema.MANAGED_ACL:
1416             q.sortByManagedAcl(order);
1417             break;
1418           default:
1419             logger.info("Unknown filter criteria {}", enumKey);
1420             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown filter criteria " + enumKey);
1421         }
1422       } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
1423         logger.warn("No sort enum matches '{}'", enumKey);
1424       }
1425     }
1426 
1427     try {
1428       return elasticsearchIndex.getByQuery(q);
1429     } catch (SearchIndexException e) {
1430       logger.error("Failed to execute search query: {}", e.getMessage());
1431       throw new SeriesException(e);
1432     }
1433   }

1435   /**
1436    * Parse two strings in UTC format into Date objects to represent a range of dates.
1437    *
1438    * @param createdFrom
1439    *          The string that represents the start date of the range.
1440    * @param createdTo
1441    *          The string that represents the end date of the range.
1442    * @return A Tuple with the two Dates
1443    * @throws IllegalArgumentException
1444    *           Thrown if the input strings are not valid UTC strings
1445    */
1446   private Tuple<Date, Date> getFromAndToCreationRange(String createdFrom, String createdTo) {
1447     Date createdFromDate = null;
1448     Date createdToDate = null;
1449     if ((StringUtils.isNotBlank(createdFrom) && StringUtils.isBlank(createdTo))
1450             || (StringUtils.isBlank(createdFrom) && StringUtils.isNotBlank(createdTo))) {
1451       logger.error("Both createdTo '{}' and createdFrom '{}' have to be specified or neither of them", createdTo,
1452               createdFrom);
1453       throw new IllegalArgumentException("Both createdTo '" + createdTo + "' and createdFrom '" + createdFrom
1454               + "' have to be specified or neither of them");
1455     } else {
1456 
1457       if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(createdFrom)) {
1458         try {
1459           createdFromDate = new Date(DateTimeSupport.fromUTC(createdFrom));
1460         } catch (IllegalStateException e) {
1461           logger.error("Unable to parse createdFrom parameter '{}'", createdFrom, e);
1462           throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unable to parse createdFrom parameter.");
1463         } catch (java.text.ParseException e) {
1464           logger.error("Unable to parse createdFrom parameter '{}'", createdFrom, e);
1465           throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unable to parse createdFrom parameter.");
1466         }
1467       }
1468 
1469       if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(createdTo)) {
1470         try {
1471           createdToDate = new Date(DateTimeSupport.fromUTC(createdTo));
1472         } catch (IllegalStateException e) {
1473           logger.error("Unable to parse createdTo parameter '{}'", createdTo, e);
1474           throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unable to parse createdTo parameter.");
1475         } catch (java.text.ParseException e) {
1476           logger.error("Unable to parse createdTo parameter '{}'", createdTo, e);
1477           throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unable to parse createdTo parameter.");
1478         }
1479       }
1480     }
1481     return new Tuple<>(createdFromDate, createdToDate);
1482   }
